entry.title: $2349 // Spacious One Bdrm in Prime Prospect Heights / C 2 3 / No FEE
entry.content:
Please Read Carefully so there is No Misunderstanding!!

Qualifications
12 month lease is a Must!!
Good Credit and Income is a Must!! "40x Income and 680+ credit score"
Guarantor welcomed
Pet Friendly
LGBTQ Friendly

Hey everyone,

We have a Newly Renovated One Bdrm in Prime Prospect Heights Location. This Spacious Unit includes

- Spacious kitchen with tons of cabinet space
- Stainless steel Appliances incld Dishwasher
- Spacious living room / common area
- Wall to wall Hardwood flooring
- Heat and Hot water Included
- Intercom Systems
- Over size windows w/ plenty of natural sunlight
- Full size Closets
- Tiled Bathroom
- Cable and internet ready!!

Prime Location steps away from the Clinton Washington Ave C Line and a 5 minute Walk to the Bergen street station 2 3 Line and all other mass transit. Easy Commute to and from the city!! Tenants will have access to 7th Ave and downtown Brooklyn which is filled with Huge shopping areas, restaurants, Laundry mats, banks, Doctors offices and so much more.

For more information or to schedule a showing, feel free to contact me Julian @Anytime (Contact info in Photos)
